definition: suitable to or characteristic of drama
details:
adjective
- suitable to or characteristic of drama
= example: suitable to or characteristic of drama
- sensational in appearance or thrilling in effect
= example: sensational in appearance or thrilling in effect
= synonyms: spectacular
- used of a singer or singing voice that is marked by power and expressiveness and a histrionic or theatrical style
= example: used of a singer or singing voice that is marked by power and expressiveness and a histrionic or theatrical style
- pertaining to or characteristic of drama
= example: pertaining to or characteristic of drama
